name: Coins Searcher
description:
You goal is to collect all coins on a level.
This game was created for  #trijam in 2 hours and 51 minutes if we dot counting creation of this page and the rest. Initially I wanted to add enemy and better level design, or at least 3 level and UI but I don't have time for all this. So now it just cycles between 1 and 2 levels.
Controlls:
WASD - Movment
Q/E - Rotate camera
Space - Jump
Escape - Quit

Source code available at
https://github.com/aliakseikalosha/Trijam1052020

IN GAME WERE USED SEVERAL ASSETS FROM Kenney.nl
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/pattern-pack
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/nature-kit
